p: Although the metrics used in both catchments (Kinzig and Treene) were different, which made a direct comparison difficult, the IHA metrics inherently cocorrelated with many other metrics from the same category (Olden & Poff, 2003). Therefore, the results for both species (SRs) and species assemblage responses (SARs) are considered insensitive to the choice of the particular metrics within the same IHA category.
